text: Oswald Norman Morris OBE, DFC, AFC, BSC (22 November 191517 March 2014) was a British Academy Award-winning cinematographer. He was known for his works in Fiddler on the Roof and in Goodbye, Mr. Chips. Morris died at his home in Dorset, England, at the age of 98. ==References== ==Other websites== * Oswald Morris at the Internet Movie Database Category:Academy Award winning cinematographers Category:BAFTA Award winners Category:British cinematographers Category:People from Middlesex Category:1915 births Category:2014 deaths
title: Oswald Morris
